attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Prime Minister to ensure that prison placements are utilised to the best potential. Release Ronnie Biggs (the great train robber) the prison place could best be used to lock up real criminals who commit crime in 2007 and not from the 1960’s

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
